oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Visual Merchandising for Organic Retailers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Richter, Toralf
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Conventional and organic supermarkets are seen as major competitors for smaller organic retailers The most competetive areas for organic retailer are apart from the assortment structure - the appropriate location - price / quality /service image
